sentences.sentence: While Mazur had summated Everest before, it would have been the first time for the others.
sentences.translation: 虽然麦哲之前已登上圣母峰顶，但对他的队友而言，那原本会是他们的第一次。

sentences.sentence: We all knew what we had to do. "While Mazur had summated Everest before, it would have been the first time for the others."
sentences.translation: 虽然麦哲之前已登上圣母峰顶，但对他的队友而言，那原本会是他们的第一次。
